title: DataDescription
description: Description of a logical collection of data files

creation_time.title: Creation Time
creation_time.description: Time in UTC that data files were created, used to uniquely identify the data

creation_date.title: Creation Date
creation_date.description: Date in UTC that data files were created, used to uniquely identify the data

name.title: Name
name.description: Name of data, conventionally also the name of the directory containing all data and metadata

institution.title: Institution
institution.description: An established society, corporation, foundation or other organization that collected this data

funding_source.title: Funding source
funding_source.description: Funding sources. If internal label as Institution.

data_level.title: Data Level
data_level.description: level of processing that data has undergone

group.title: Group
group.description: A short name for the group of individuals that collected this data

project_name.title: Project Name
project_name.description: A name for a set of coordinated activities intended to achieve one or more objectives

project_id.title: Project ID
project_id.description: A database or other identifier for a project

restrictions.title: Restrictions
restrictions.description: Detail any restrictions on publishing or sharing these data

modality.title: Modality
modality.description: A short name for the specific manner, characteristic, pattern of application, or the employment of any technology or formal procedure to generate data for a study

subject_id.title: Subject Id
subject_id.description: Unique identifier for the subject of data acquisition
